select c1_0.id,c1_0.level,c1_0.name,p1_0.id,p1_0.level,p1_0.name,p1_0.parent_category_id from categories c1_0 left join categories p1_0 on p1_0.id=c1_0.parent_category_id where c1_0.id=?

select p1_0.id,p1_0.brand,p1_0.category_id,p1_0.color,p1_0.created_at,p1_0.description,p1_0.discount_persent,p1_0.discounted_price,p1_0.image_url,p1_0.num_ratings,p1_0.price,p1_0.quantity,p1_0.title from product p1_0 join categories c1_0 on c1_0.id=p1_0.category_id where (c1_0.name=? or ?=?) and ((? is ? and ? is ?) or (p1_0.discounted_price between ? and ?)) and (? is ? or p1_0.discount_persent>=?) order by case when ?=? then p1_0.discounted_price end asc,case when ?=? then p1_0.discounted_price end desc,p1_0.created_at desc
select r1_0.product_id,r1_0.id,r1_0.created_at,r1_0.rating,r1_0.user_id from rating r1_0 where r1_0.product_id=?

select r1_0.product_id,r1_0.id,r1_0.created_at,r1_0.review,u1_0.id,u1_0.created_at,u1_0.email,u1_0.first_name,u1_0.last_name,u1_0.mobile,u1_0.password,u1_0.role from review r1_0 left join users u1_0 on u1_0.id=r1_0.user_id where r1_0.product_id=?
